pages.text: To use many of the mountain folk's machines, you're going to need to supply them $(thing)Ember Energy$() produced by an $(l:quests/chap3/19activator#activator)$(item)Ember Activator$(). Doing so requires $(item)Ember Emitters$() and $(item)Receptors$(). These must be placed on the devices that are sending and receiving the $(thing)Ember$() respectively. Next, link them using a $(l:quests/chap3/16emberbore#hammer)$(item)Tinker's Hammer$(), by Shift-Right-Clicking with it on the $(item)Receptor$(), then Right-Clicking on the $(item)Emitter$().

pages.heading: Ember Emitter
pages.description: $(item)Emitters$() require a redstone signal to turn on.

pages.heading: Ember Receptor
pages.description: Can only be linked to one emitter at a time.
